channel.title: Turmoil causes ugly hits?
channel.description: I like the idea of having a turmoil server with the right animation, etc., but why is it that almost EVERY source that has turmoil has ugly hits? I mean I don't want to leech a source but I always see that they have it and I don't know about adding turmoil to my source because I do not want ugly hits.

item.title: Turmoil causes ugly hits?
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

It doesn’t change the splash images but most sources that has turmoil have different splash images, for some reason. I believe it is because they have to add more damage, since turmoil hits higher and the sprites they use just aren’t good. I’m not sure though.

Read full topic

item.title: Turmoil causes ugly hits?
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Yeah the 10x isn’t even on most turmoil sources but they have like goofy lookin damage splashes and soul split effects “most of them” that I just can’t stand. So if anyone can show me a way to add turmoil without doing all that, I’d be greatful. Obviously I’d like soul split as well, but I can manage without.

Read full topic

item.title: Turmoil causes ugly hits?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

public static boolean newDamage = true;

All it takes is changing true; to false;

Read full topic
